name: Break The Sun
description:
Tap the screen when the pointer points to the green and blue bars.
Keep destroying various props until the galaxy.
Don't forget to upgrade your character.

Features:
◉ Perfect design,Full of funny.
◉ Hundreds of different levels.
◉ Full phone support.
◉ Totally free download.

Break The Sun is Suit for all age and completely FREE to play!
Now play and be the most strongest man in the universe!
